TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1635
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F. Austin to Captain Dillard, 05-01-1827

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Capt. Dillard, May 1, 1827. Land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1635

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Capt. Dillard, May 1, 1827. Land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*I have made an arrangement with *person_mentioned*Capt Dillard*/person_mentioned* to let him have the *location_mentioned*half of the League of Land sold by *person_mentioned*DeMoss */person_mentioned*to *person_mentioned*J. E. B. Austin*/person_mentioned* */location_mentioned*for which he is to pay the usual fees paid in the *location_mentioned*old colony*/location_mentioned*—he is to notify me wheither he takes said *location_mentioned*land */location_mentioned*or not within four months, and if he does not give such notice within that time, I shall no longer be bound—Also he is to have *location_mentioned*a Labor at an island of timber in the *location_mentioned*Bay Prairie*/location_mentioned* nearly opposite to *person_mentioned*Kawl*/person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned*, provided he gives notice to me that he will take it within two months*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-01-1827">May 1. 1827*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
